articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from UAE Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from UAE Ambassador
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Ambassador of the United Arab Emirates to the DPRK Abdulla Khalfan Mater Al Romaithi at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Former Moldovan President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Former Moldovan President
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Vladimir Voronin, former president of Moldova and chairman of the Party of Communists of the Moldovan Republic, sent greetings to Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, on Sep. 9.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend sincere congratulations to you and all the Korean people in the name of the Central Committee of the Party of Communists of the Moldovan Republic and all the communists of Moldova and on behalf of myself on the 64th birthday of the DPRK, the national day.
					
					 We hope you and all the Korean people will hit their goals and achieve new fruitful success and victory in the cause of building a modern state.
					
					 Long live the Democratic People's Republic of Korea!
					
					 Long live the friendship and cooperation between the two countries and peoples!
					
					 Please accept my consideration.

articles.title: Agreement on Debt Settlement between DPRK, Russia Signed
articles.content:
Agreement on Debt Settlement between DPRK, Russia Signed
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- An agreement on settling the debt incurred by the loan provided by the former Soviet Union which the DPRK owes to the Russian Federation was signed between the governments of the two countries in Moscow on Monday.
					 The agreement was inked by Vice-Minister of Finance Ki Kwang Ho from the DPRK side and Vice-Minister of Finance Sergey Storchak from the Russian side. 
					
					 The conclusion of the agreement on the debt settlement would create fresh conditions for boosting the relations of economic cooperation between the two countries in the future.

articles.title: KPA Military Delegation Comes Back Home
articles.content:
KPA Military Delegation Comes Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- A military delegation of the Korean People's Army led by Kang Phyo Yong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, came back home on Tuesday after visiting Indonesia.

articles.title: IIJI Director-General Tours Pyongyang
articles.content:
IIJI Director-General Tours Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), visited the Rungna People's Pleasure Park on Tuesday.
					 The park, another creation built in the era of the Workers' Party, represents the loving care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un for the people.
					
					 After looking round various places of the park, Vishwanath said that the Korean people came to have one more wonderful cultural recreation ground. It is only in the DPRK where the people enjoy the world of high civilization, he added.
					
					 He also toured National Gifts Exhibition House, Museum of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, etc.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit National Gifts Exhibition House
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit National Gifts Exhibition House 
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Participants in the 8th Pyongyang International Science and Technology Book Fair were deeply moved to see gifts displayed at the National Gifts Exhibition House in the DPRK.
					 Georgii Toloraya, head of a delegation of the Russkiy Mir Foundation of Russia, said:
					
					 Every gift reflects the profound trust reposed by the Korean people in President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 These valuable gifts were presented by a countless number of Koreans.
					
					 The leaders are truly respected as the great fathers of the Korean nation.
					
					 The head of a delegation of Beijing Foreign Languages University of China said his visit to the exhibition house offered an opportunity to know better about the noble traits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He had never seen such a wonderful exhibition house, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un made sure that the gifts presented to them were preserved as treasures of people.
					
					 They devoted everything to the people's wellbeing. The National Gifts Exhibition House will always stand as wealth of the Korean people.
					
					 The head of a delegation of the Environmental Education Media Project said:
					
					 I was amazed to see so many gifts on display.
					
					 Our visit to the house helped us to realize that the leaders of the DPRK are great patriots.
					
					 The news that His Excellency Kim Jong Un is making ceaseless journeys for field guidance for the people's happiness is evoking a lively response among various countries.
					
					 A member of a delegation of the Liaoning Provincial Association for International Friendly Contact in China said he was impressed by a huge number of gifts.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un saw to it that the gifts they received from Koreans in the north, the south and abroad were preserved as treasures of the country, he added.
					
					 He said the exhibition house fully reflects all Koreans' boundless respect for them, adding:
					
					 Such precious gifts can hardly be found in any other place.
					
					 The exhibition house is a great treasure house praising the great leaders as it showcases the Korean people's loyalty to them.
					
					 The Korean nation's reverence for them will grow stronger.

articles.title: Posters on 13th Pyongyang Int'l Film Festival Released
articles.content:
Posters on 13th Pyongyang Int'l Film Festival Released
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK printed posters ahead of the 13th Pyongyang International Film Festival.
					 They reflect the desire and wishes of the Korean people and other progressives to spur the development of national films and boost the exchange and cooperation in movie field.
					
					 They portray Korean and foreign films to be shown and depict torch prize, highlighting the significance of the festival.
					
					 The poster implies warm welcome to foreigners coming to Pyongyang carrying with the feelings to the Korean people and the mind to significantly decorate the festival.
					
					 The poster depicting a flying dove together with words "Independence", "Peace" and "Friendship" reflects the desire of progressives to enjoy a true life in the independent and peaceful world and the idea of the festival. 
					
					 Those posters will contribute to livening up the festival atmosphere.

articles.title: 10th National Korean Dress Exhibition to Be Held
articles.content:
10th National Korean Dress Exhibition to Be Held 
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The 10th National Korean Dress Exhibition will take place at the Central Youth Hall here on September 19-21.
					 Hong Myong Hwa, a section chief of the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 "The exhibition, held each year from Juche 92 (2003), aims to widely introduce the Korean nation's excellent dressing culture and further develop it.
					
					 The Korean Apparel Association, a sponsor of the exhibition, has employed advanced clothing techniques in making preparations for the exhibition.
					
					 Korean dresses selected at provincial exhibitions will be put on display at the national exhibition.
					
					 The forthcoming national exhibition will be characterized by show of men's apparels of various styles, unlike the past exhibitions which focused on women's seasonal dresses. It will also include a presentation of clothing techniques, display of books on clothes and multi-media services on garment processing.
					
					 Prizes will be awarded to winners and a rotating trophy and cups to the organizations that will prove successful.
					
					 A fashion show is also expected during the exhibition."

articles.title: DPRK's Amnokgang Sports Team
articles.content:
DPRK's Amnokgang Sports Team
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Amnokgang Sports Team in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is greeting its 65th birthday.
					 The Team was formed on September 19, Juche 36 (1947) with athletes who participated in the 1st World Festival of Youth and Students.
					
					 It has made a big contribution to demonstrating the nation's dignity and honor over the past 65 years.
					
					 The Team clinched some 430 gold medals in Olympiads, world championships and other international tournaments.
					
					 Jong Song Ok, a DPRK Hero, won the title in the women's marathon of the 7th World Track-and-Field Championship.
					
					 Sin Kum Dan broke world records for 11 times at international women's track-and-field tournaments, including the 1st GANEFO.
					
					 A boxer Ku Yong Jo took the gold in the 21st Olympiad, wrestler Kim Il in the 25th and 26th Olympiads, wrestler Ri Hak Son in the 25th Olympiad, weightlifter Pak Hyon Suk in the 29th Olympiad and weightlifter Om Yun Chol in the 30th Olympiad.
					
					 Ri Song Hui rose to fame as a "woman of muscle" at the 15th and 16th World Women's Weightlifting Championships and paddlers Ri Pun Hui and Pak Yong Ok distinguished themselves in international table-tennis tournaments.
					
					 Hong Myong Gum, O Kum Hui and Ri Un Hyang of the Team played key roles in making the DPRK win in the 2006 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.
					
					 The Amnokgang Sports Team garnered more than 500 trophies and 20 000 odd medals in domestic sports contests, including Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games and national championships.
					
					 Honored with the Order of Kim Il Sung twice, the Team boasts of seven DPRK Heroes and Labor Heroes, more than 100 People's and Merited Sportspersons and over 440 aces.
					
					 Hong Sok Yong, head of the Team, told KCNA that it would make a bigger contribution to exalting the nation's reputation.

articles.title: Typhoon-16 Affects Some Parts of DPRK
articles.content:
Typhoon-16 Affects Some Parts of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Typhoon-16, which was formed in waters east of the Philippines on Sep. 11, moved northward, bringing heavy rains, strong wind and tidal waves to most east coastal areas of Korea and some parts of Ryanggang, North Phyongan and North and South Hwanghae provinces in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 From 18:00 Sunday to 03:00 Tuesday, it rained 160 mm in Kosong County and 120 mm in Thongchon County, Kangwon Province, 129 mm in Kyonghung County and 127 mm in Hoeryong City, North Hamgyong Province, 108 mm in Hochon County and 107 mm in Riwon County, South Hamgyong Province and 93 mm in Paekam Workers' District, Ryanggang Province.
					
					 Riwon, Hwadae, Myonggan and Kyonghung counties and Hoeryong and Chongjin cities were hit by rainstorm.
					
					 The typhoon whipped up wind of 20 meters per second in Kosong County, 17 meters per second in Changdo County and 15 meters per second in Kumgang County, Kangwon Province, bringing wind of over 10 meters per second to most parts of Kangwon and North and South Hamgyong provinces and some west coastal areas.
					
					 Tidal waves as high as 103 centimeters were observed in the sea off Pochon area of Myongchon County and 59 centimeters in the sea off Kimchaek City, North Hamgyong Province and 97 centimeters in the sea off Thongchon County, Kangwon Province.
					
					 The typhoon passed through the north coastal area of North Hamgyong Province on Tuesday morning.

articles.title: New Saturant for Agrochemicals Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Saturant for Agrochemicals Developed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Institute for Botany Protection under the Academy of Agricultural Science have developed a new type of saturant raising the efficacy of agrochemicals.
					 This saturant, made of refined mineral oil emulsified into water without using organic solvent or surfactant, enhances the adhesion of agrochemicals.
					
					 When the saturant is sprayed to leaves or stalks of crops, it forms oil film on the surface of vermin eggs to shut out their breathing.     Some of oil penetrates inside eggs through stigma and congeals their protein. It also goes into the mouth of vermin including tick and aphis to deter breathing.
					
					 The introduction of the saturant can considerably raise the effect of agrochemicals while decreasing the amount of their application by half.
					
					 The saturant won a high appreciation at the 12th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies held recently.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving Juche Character, National Identity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving Juche Character, National Identity
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) --The progressive people of the world are required to strengthen international unity and cooperation. This is prerequisite to opposing imperialism and hegemony and preserving the Juche character and national identity of each country, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 International unity and cooperation should be achieved on the principle of independence under any circumstances.
					
					 The unity and cooperation based on independence alone can contribute to accomplishing the common cause of preserving the Juche character and national identity.
					
					 It is necessary to boost South-South cooperation on the principle of collective self-reliance.
					
					 If the developing countries aspiring after independence develop the South-South cooperation, they can certainly foil the imperialists' moves for world "integration" and successfully build independent national economy without depending on them.
					
					 They, at the same time, can develop the material and cultural life creatively in conformity with the aspiration and wishes of their peoples.
					
					 The democratization of the international community provides an important guarantee for preserving the Juche character and national identity of each country.
					
					 For the countries aspiring after independence to boost international unity and cooperation is the only way for deterring the imperialist forces from trifling with international organizations including the U.N. and settling all international issues on a democratic principle.
					
					 The DPRK will wage a positive struggle to strengthen the unity and cooperation with the progressives of the world and democratize the international community. By doing so, it will fulfill its international duty and mission of the times in accomplishing the common cause of preserving the Juche character and national identity of countries and nations and achieving global independence.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Pursuing Nuclear Policy
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Pursuing Nuclear Policy
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- At a NATO summit in May the U.S. reportedly forced the German government to agree with it to keep the U.S. forces' nuclear weapons deployed in the country and update them together with nuclear capable fighter Tornado by 2024 with billions of euros of investment.
					 Minju Joson on Tuesday in a bylined commentary says this shows that the U.S. is still pursuing its world domination strategy by nuclear weapons and that the "plan for world without nuclear weapons" it declared to the world was an empty word to deceive the international community.
					
					 The U.S. has never thought about a denuclearized world and only dreams of controlling the world by nuclear weapons, says the commentary, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has threatened the sovereignty and right to existence of the DPRK with harsh hostile policy to it, creating a nuclear issue in the Korean Peninsula and making the prospect of its denuclearization gloomy.
					
					 The U.S. is a top nuclear criminal which is to blame for nuclear fear of the world.
					
					 It should immediately end its foolish rackets of mocking and deceiving the world with its empty words like "world without nuclear weapons" and be severely punished by the justice and human conscience.
					
					 The U.S. who seeks nuclear will perish by it.
					
					 The criminal nuclear policy of the U.S. will never bring it better future. It would be well advised to bear it in mind and behave itself.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Remarks under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye, a "presidential" candidate from the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea, in a recent "forum" asserted that the "north should make a decision to dismantle its nukes" and "she expected a positive change".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 What Park uttered disclosed her real intention to realize her ambition for seizing power with a confrontational stand as it is nothing but an expression of her will to carry forward the failed "policy toward the north" pursued by the Lee Myung Bak group.
					
					 Park is not paying heed to the wishes of the times and people's mindset but sticking to the policy of confrontation pursued by traitor Lee, far from drawing a lesson from his failures. This is clearly evidenced by Park's call for the DPRK's "dismantlement of nukes" and "change".
					
					 Park is seeking a way for coming to power in confrontation with fellow countrymen. This behavior only invites self-destruction.
					
					 The DPRK had already clarified its stand that it would never pardon anyone hurting its dignity and system regardless of who seizes power in south Korea.
					
					 Park is seriously mistaken if she calculated the show of her posture for confrontation with the north would be favorable for her "election" campaign. Her cry out for such confrontation would get her nowhere.
					
					 Those who go reckless ignorant of the people's mindset and desire are bound to face their resistance.
					
					 Park had better draw a lesson from the fate of Lee Myung Bak with reason.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Warmongers for Holding Anti-DPRK War Drills
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Warmongers for Holding Anti-DPRK War Drills
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are stepping up military show-down with the DPRK after creating the touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula by staging joint military drill Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					They staged coordinated firepower combat drill in Phochon, Kyonggi Province on September 13 with the involvement of motorized unit of the ground force and air force.
					
					 Involved there were more than 1 500 troops of 17 units and over 130 war means of 15 kinds including tank, armed car, airplane, MLRS and gunship.
					
					 The warmongers held demonstration firing exercise of all firepower weapons and let the 7th corps specializing in mobile operations wage attack operation and firing drill.   
					
					 They even organized the watch of the drill by military personnel of various countries, citizens in Kyonggi Province and even students of primary, secondary and high schools, fanning up anti-DPRK war hysteria.
					
					 The puppet forces are frequently holding the DPRK-targeted war drills with increasing intensity despite the warnings issued by the DPRK several times.
					
					 The UFG was followed by the big mobile drill and drill for coping with local provocation by the 7th and 17th divisions of the ground force, ground exercises in the area of Phaju City, Kyonggi Province by ground force units early in September.
					
					 There was also a firing drill by the marine corps in the area of Yonphyong Island on September 12 with the involvement of mortar and machine gun.
					
					 The 8th corps clarified that it will hold anti-infiltration joint drill in Ryongdong area of south Korean Kangwon Province on September 18 and 19.
					
					 The warmongers are coming out with the "basic plan for national defense reform 12 -30" while crying out for "structural reform" to cope with "changed security environment".
					
					 The core of the plan is to round off the puppet forces' offensive structure, develop and deploy missiles for "striking north's nuclear facilities and missile bases and other core facilities" and drastically beef up ultra-modern attack weapons.
					
					 The military moves of the Lee Myung Bak regime constitute a dangerous seed of a war as they are aimed to increase the capacity for preemptive attack and ignite a new war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 It was quite just for the southwestern front command of the Korean People's Army to release a press release under the prevailing situation.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are now on high alert to launch an over-all counter attack to promptly retaliate against the enemies and achieve the great cause of national reunification.
					
					 The will of the army and people to devotedly safeguard the country is running high.
					
					 The warmongers will meet destruction if they dare preempt.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Refers to True Meaning of Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Refers to True Meaning of Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyon Hwan, director of the Institute of Independent Ideology in the U.S., posted on his Internet homepage an article titled "True meaning of Kim Jong Il's patriotism".
					 The article recalled that the dear respected Kim Jong Un published a famous work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country".
					
					 It praised leader Kim Jong Il as a peerless patriot who ardently loved the country and its people and performed undying feats which would always go down in the history of Korea by devoting all his life to achieving the prosperity of the country and its people's happiness.
					
					 First Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Un said that Kim Jong Il's love for the socialist country and its people and his total dedication to the prosperity of the country and its people's happiness were prompted by his absolute trust in his people and his unshakable faith in the validity of the socialist system and the victory of the socialist cause, the article noted.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's warm love and devotion for the country and its people also stemmed from his noblest mission, it said, adding that he could make so hard Songun journeys for patriotic devotion with a do-or-die will as he was deeply aware of noble awareness and mission that he was responsible for the destiny of the people whom President Kim Il Sung entrusted to him before his passing.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism is the acme of socialist patriotism, it said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that Kim Jong Il's patriotism would serve as precious ideological and spiritual pabulum indispensable for all people who love the country and its people, a powerful motive force giving courage and vitality to all those who struggle for the country and its people, a bright beacon helping bring them up to be patriots generation after generation and a compass in struggle and life.
					
					 He expects all party members, service personnel of the People's Army and people to breathe the same breath and keep pace on the road of patriotic devotion taken by Kim Jong Il, dedicating himself to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of posterity with deep trust and loving care for the country and its people and the younger generation.
					
					 He also hopes that  they would neither just shout slogans of  Kim Jong Il's patriotism nor consider it as a banner but learn from the noble example of patriotism set by Kim Jong Il and thoroughly embody it in their practical activities for building a rich and powerful country,

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Posted on Internet Homepage of Russian Youth Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Posted on Internet Homepage of Russian Youth Organization
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The main contents of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's works "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" and "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Advancing under the Uplifted Immortal Banners Bearing Portraits of Smiling Great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" were posted by the Young Communist League of Russia on its Internet website on Sept. 9.
					 His work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country", published on July 26, 2012, clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his life characterized by his love for the country and its people.
					
					 It also indicates important tasks for embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 His speech at the celebration banquet on August 25, 2012 "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Advancing under the Uplifted Immortal Banners Bearing Portraits of Smiling Great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" clarifies the Songun leadership feats of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It calls for making dynamic efforts for a final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the Songun cause of revolution pioneered by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and led successfully by Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Russian youth organization also posted a congratulatory message Kim Jong Un sent to the participants in the celebrations of Youth Day and other young people across the country.
					
					 The work, published on August 27, 2012, clarifies that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed undying exploits by perfectly solving the issue of young people for the first time in history by pursuing an original policy of giving importance to them and loving them in the whole period of leading the  revolution.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks to be fulfilled by the young Koreans for giving fuller play to their bravery, unity and militancy in defending the country and building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Tanzanian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Tanzanian Paper
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- A detailed gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" was carried by the Tanzanian paper Uhuru on Sept. 11.
					 The work, made public on July 26, 2012, clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life characterized by his love for the country and its people.
					
					 It also indicates important issues arising in effecting Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Russian Paper
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Russian paper Our House Sochi carried a special write-up lauding the greatness of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 The paper on August 23 carried photos of Marshal Kim Jong Un providing field guidance to Changjon Street and participating in the inaugural ceremony of the Rungna People's Pleasure Park.
					
					 It noted Kim Jong Un, the youngest leader in the world, is leading the DPRK, adding:
					
					 It is characteristic of his mode of leadership that he is pursuing a policy of love for the people and the younger generation, steadfastly carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					 He is paying deep attention to the improvement of standard of people's living, in particular.  He visited the construction site of apartment houses several times and provided ordinary people with those completed houses free of charge.
					
					 He made sure that the world-class pleasure park was built for the people and participated in its inaugural ceremony.
					
					 The paper on September 6 also carried articles praising his love for the younger generation and future illustrated with photos of him participating in the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations celebrating the 66th anniversary of the KCU, giving field guidance to Kyongsang Nursery and Kyongsang Kindergarten newly built in Changjon Street.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Observed by Foreign Media
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Observed by Foreign Media 
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Magazines and newspapers of various countries devoted special write-ups to the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The September issue of International Relations, a magazine of Hong Kong, China carried a special write-up illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and photos of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The magazine in an article titled "Independent power" gave a detailed account of the fact that under the wise guidance of the peerlessly great men, the DPRK has demonstrated its dignity by pursuing an independent policy and its might with its self-supporting economy and created an ever-victorious history with its self-defensive military capability.
					
					 In an article titled "Kim Jong Un, world focus" the magazine said posted on Google in ten odd days after the demise of Kim Jong Il were 67.4 million articles, about 230 000 per hour.
					
					 The Ugandan paper Sun Rise on September 9 carried an article introducing in detail the shining exploits the army and people of the DPRK performed in building a thriving socialist nation under the uplifted banner of Songun, together with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 A Senegalese paper on September 6 in an article titled "Eternal Kim Il Sung's Korea" said the DPRK would shine long as eternal Kim Il Sung's Korea.
					
					 The Zimbabwean paper Herald on September 8 carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il's patriotism giving spurs to prosperity".
					
					 The paper said supreme leader Kim Jong Un is energetically leading the Korean people in their struggle to attain the goal to build an economic power, consolidating the status of the DPRK as a politico-ideological power and military power at the helm of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Celebrated Abroad 
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Diverse events took place in different countries on Sept. 5 and 6 to celebrate the 64th birthday of the DPRK. 
					 They included a lecture, book and photo exhibition and film show held in India, a lecture and photo exhibition in Romania and lectures in Ethiopia and Ukraine. 
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos showing the undying feats performed by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in building and developing the DPRK and the revolutionary activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also on display there were works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and other Korean books and photos showing the drive of the Korean people for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Shown at the film shows was a Korean film introducing the mass gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang". 
					
					 Parveen Gupta, secretary general of the Indian Society for Juche Idea-Self-Reliance Studies, said that the DPRK is demonstrating its might as an independent power, adding that it would be unthinkable without the exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The DPRK will become a more powerful independent country and a better country for the people to live in under the outstanding leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, a creditable successor to the idea and cause of the preceding leaders, he added.
					
					 Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, said that the DPRK has fully embodied the Juche idea centered on the popular masses into all its state activities, regarding it as the only guidelines, and put the single-minded unity of the whole society on the highest level. 
					
					 Medhane, secretary general of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, said Kim Il Sung was the father of socialist Korea who founded the DPRK, Kim Jong Il was a great master of politics who put the DPRK on the position of a power and Kim Jong Un is the young leader who is carrying forward and glorifying the exploits of the preceding leaders. 
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in Romania.

articles.title: Peruvian Organization Demands Immediate Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea
articles.content:
Peruvian Organization Demands Immediate Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea  
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism made public a statement in demand of the immediate withdrawal of the U.S. troops from south Korea on Sept. 10. 
					 The statement recalled that after the U.S. imperialists' military occupation of south Korea in September 1945 they pursued a neo-colonial rule harsher than that of the Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 The U.S. military presence in south Korea is the root cause of the tension on the Korean Peninsula and the unstable situation in Northeast Asia, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The war exercises for aggression staged by the U.S. troops together with the south Korean puppet army have turned the Korean Peninsula into the world's biggest hotspot where a war may break out any moment.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime persist in the hostile policy towards the DPRK and keep the U.S. troops in south Korea, the DPRK will be left with no option but to further bolster up its nuclear deterrence to protect its dignity and sovereignty.

articles.title: Equatorial Guinean Party Leader Supports Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Equatorial Guinean Party Leader Supports Korean People's Just Cause
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Kwak Ji Hwan, DPRK ambassador to Equatorial Guinea, paid a courtesy call on Lucas Nguema Esono, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, on Sept. 11. 
					 The general secretary highly praised the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people for having achieved great successes in the drive for political stability and prosperity of the country, united close around Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, true to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea denounces the evermore undisguised anti-DPRK moves of the enemies as grave provocative acts to disturb the political stability and peace of the DPRK, he said, and went on:
					
					 It was entirely just when Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, issued an order to the KPA to deal prompt deadly counter-blows at the enemies, if they fire even a single shell at the DPRK's territory, and lead the battle to a great war for national reunification. 
					
					 We will always express full support and solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle for a just cause. 
					
					 The Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea is confident that the WPK and the Korean people will foil the persistent provocative moves of the enemies, protect peace and security and achieve the independent reunification of the country without fail.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Observed at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Observed at DPRK Missions Abroad 
						
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Diverse events took place at DPRK missions abroad to celebrate the 64th anniversary of the DPRK from Sept. 5 to 14. 
					 Receptions were given and book, photo and art exhibitions and film shows were held at DPRK missions in Cuba, Iran, India, Pakistan, Kuwait, Guinea, Democratic Congo, Equatorial Guinea, Uganda, Bulgaria, Uzbekistan, Poland, the Czech Republic, Switzerland, Sweden, Great Britain, Austria, Germany, Peru, Mexico and Brazil. 
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos showing the revolutionary feats of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great men and other books and photos and fine art pieces showing the path covered by the DPRK. 
					
					 Korean films shown included "Pyongyang at Night," "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Pyongyang Today." 
					
					 Present at the events on invitation were officials of governments, political parties, parliaments, organizations, institutions, organizations for the study of the Juche idea, bodies for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people of relevant countries, those of international and regional organizations and non-governmental organizations and diplomats of various countries. 
					
					 Foreign high ranking officials praised the feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in founding and developing the DPRK. Among them were the minister of Traffic of Pakistan, minister of Foreign Affairs and Overseas Compatriots of Guinea, general secretary of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Cooperation and Francophone Affairs of Democratic Congo and the minister of State of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Uganda. 
					
					 They highly praised Kim Jong Un as another great man identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in idea, leadership ability and personality.

articles.title: Suicide Rate Increases among Young S. Koreans
articles.content:
Suicide Rate Increases among Young S. Koreans 
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Suicide rate has drastically increased among young south Koreans.
					 According to data released by an institution concerned recently, suicide rate of adolescents' ages from 15 to 19 doubled for the past decade. One of five attempts suicide, making suicide hold the first place in the causes of adolescent deaths.
					
					 Religious, academic and civilian experts of south Korea were reported to have reached an agreement on preventing adolescent suicides, expressing deep concerns over the serious suicides of adolescents.
					
					 Young people are giving up lives, with their hope for the future being dashed to the ground. This is an inevitable product of the unpopular rule by the south Korean authorities and social evil.

articles.title: Rubricado acuerdo Corea-Rusia sobre ajuste de deudas
articles.content:
Rubricado acuerdo Corea-Rusia sobre ajuste de deudas
						
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedo suscrito el dia 17 en Moscu un "Convenio entre el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el de la Federacion Rusa sobre el ajuste de las deudas contraidas a la Federacion Rusa por el prestamo ofrecido en el periodo de la ex URSS".
					Lo firmaron Ki Kwang Ho, viceministro de Finanzas, por la parte coreana y por la rusa, el homologo ruso Serguei Storchak.
					
					La concertacion de ese acuerdo ofrecera una nueva condicion a ampliar y desarrollar mas en el futuro las relaciones de cooperacion economica entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador de EAU
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador de EAU
						
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Abdulla Khalfan Mater Al Romaithi presento el dia 18 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Estado de los Emiratos Arabes.
					  Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el embajador.

articles.title: Actos por 9 de septiembre en embajadas de RPDC en extranjero
articles.content:
Actos por 9 de septiembre en embajadas de RPDC en extranjero 
						
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tuvieron lugar del dia 5 al 14 banquetes, exhibiciones de libros, fotos y bellas artes y encuentros de cine en las representaciones de la RPDC acreditadas en Cuba, Iran, la India, Pakistan, Kuwait, Guinea, el Congo Democratico, Guinea Ecuatorial, Uganda, Bulgaria, Uzbekistan, Polonia, Checo, Suiza, Suecia, Gran Bretana, Austria, Alemania, el Peru, Mexico y Brasil.
					En los lugares estaban exhibidas las fotos alusivas a las hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente       Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Ademas, estaban expuestos las obras de los grandes Hombres sin pares, los libros, las fotos y las pinturas que dan a conocer la trayectoria de la RPDC.
					
					En los encuentros de cine se proyectaron las peliculas coreanas, entre otras, "Noche de Pyongyang", "Lluvia de chispas de la gran potencia prospera", "Pyongyang de hoy", etc.
					
					A los actos fueron invitadas las personalidades de gobiernos, partidos politicos, parlamento, entidades, organos, grupos de estudio de la idea Juche y entidades de amistad y solidaridad con el pueblo coreano, organizaciones internacionales y regionales, instituciones no gubernamentales y diplomaticos de varios paises.
					
					Entre los participantes figuran el ministro de Transporte de Pakistan, el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores y Compatriotas en Ultramar de Guinea, el secretario general del Ministerio encargado de Relaciones Exteriores, las Cooperaciones Internacionales y Paises en Frances del Congo Democratico, el ministro de estado del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Uganda y otros.
					
					Ellos elogiaron las hazanas del Presidente        Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il acumuladas en la fundacion, el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo de la RPDC.
					
					Dijeron que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un es el Gran Hombre quien encarna la idea, la direccion y virtudes del Presidente y el Dirigente.

articles.title: ACNC comenta ejercicios militares de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta ejercicios militares de titeres surcoreanos
						
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos exacerbaron la tension de la Peninsula Coreana con los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Ulji Freedom Guardian", y esta vez fortalecen mas las maquinaciones conflictivas militares contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Ellos libraron el dia 13 en Phochon de la provincia de Kyonggi los ejercicios conjuntos de combate de fuegos con la participacion de las unidades motorizadas de las fuerzas terrestres y las fuerzas aereas incluyendo mas de mil 500 efectivos de 17 unidades del ejercito titere, tanques, carros blindados, aviones, lanzacohetes reactivos, helicopteros para el ataque y mas de 130 equipos belicos de 15 generos.
					
					Los belicistas libaron freneticamente la operacion de ataque y los ejercicios de tiro del cuerpo movil no.7 del ejercito titere junto con los tiros de potencia de los equipos e incitaron el fervor de guerra anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Coreainvitando bajo el rotulo de visita a los miembros de varios paises, los habitantes y hasta a los alumnos de las escuelas primarias, secundarias y superiores de la provincia.
					
					Pese a varias advertencias de la RPDC, los titeres frecuentan los ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC e intensifican cada dia mas la densidad de simulacro.
					
					Tras culminarse los ejercicios conjuntos militares "Ulji Freedom Guardian", la division no.7 y no.17 de las fuerzas terrestres libraron en septiembre los ejercicios de movilizacion de gran envergadura y el entrenamiento frente a la provocacion local, y las unidades de las fuerzas terrestres desarrollaron los ejercicios en la zona de la ciudad de Phaju de la misma provincia, asi como el dia 12, la infanteria de marina realizo en la zona de la isla Yonphyong los ejercicios de tiro de morteros y ametralladores.
					
					Por otra parte, el cuerpo no.8 del ejercito titere publico que desarrollaria los dias 18 y 19 en la zona de Ryongdong de la provincia de Kangwon del Sur de Corea los ejercicios combinados contra las infiltraciones.
					
					Los belicistas titeres presentan el "plan principal para la reforma de defensa nacional 12-30"  pretextando la "reorganizacion de estructura" frente al "ambiente de seguridad cambiado".
					
					La esencia de este plan es completar la estructura de tipo de ataque del ejercito titere, desarrollar y ubicar los misiles capaces de "atacar a las instalaciones nucleares, las bases de misiles y otros importantes establecimientos del Norte" y aumentar en gran escala las armas de ataque de punta.
					
					Todos los movimientos militares de la banda de Lee Myung Bak constituyen una intencion peligrosa  de desatar a toda costa la nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana fortaleciendo la capacidad de ataque preventivo.
					
					Frente a la situacion creada, la comandancia del frente sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea publico ya la informacion abierta.
					
					Ahora, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC culminaron los preparativos para asestar el golpe demoledor a los enemigos y pasar al contraataque general para lograr la gran causa de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Si los belicistas se atreven a atacarnos les caera solo la tumba de derrota.
